verses.name: Leviticus 19:6
verses.text: It shall be eaten the same day ye offer it, and on the morrow: and if ought remain until the third day, it shall be burnt in the fire.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:7
verses.text: And if it be eaten at all on the third day, it is abominable; it shall not be accepted.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:8
verses.text: Therefore every one that eateth it shall bear his iniquity, because he hath profaned the hallowed thing of the Lord: and that soul shall be cut off from among his people.
